message:
SYSTEM: Elozano_resultsINRIA.pdf: Página 15
QR models as application scenario 
•
Management of QR models in a central semantic repository 
•
Grounding of QR models using DBpedia as background knowledge 
•
Selection of QR relevant models to the user from the repository, based 
on QR modeling similarity and users’ ratings 
•
Alignment of QR models using ontology matching techniques 
•
Detection of discrepancies in the learner’s model based on mappings 
•
Generation of feedback suggesting actions to avoid the discrepancies 
•
System for rating the obtained feedback 
 
15 
Conceptual Modeling Supported by Semantic Techniques 
DynaLearn results
speaker: SYSTEM
